value:
$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face|You are so, SO weak. Ugh...
How disappointing. You don't
even make a good toy.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Was it you who closed our people
in darkness?$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face|Oh, that? ...Does it matter?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Return them...to their proper state...$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face|Haha! No... No, I don't think I will...
They are an offering to my most
magnificent master!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|An...offering?!$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Smile|See? You get it! All you mortals die
so quickly anyway. Losing a few lonely
individuals shouldn't bother anyone.$k$pServing to nourish my lady will at
least give their worthless lives some
meaning as they end!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|...I will...destroy you for this!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Princess Veronica!$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Hmph. One nuisance would be too
simple, wouldn't it.$k$p

$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Askran fools... When my lady's time
arrives, none of you will live to fight
much longer.$k$pBut if you're in such a rush to die,
I am willing to oblige!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...Ergh!$k$pMy Lady... If I was at my full power...
this wouldn't have—$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|He disappeared. Did he...die?$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|In one sense, yes, but in another, no.
He has entered a state that is difficult
to put into straightforward language...$k$pAs he is Embla's retainer, however,
we must stay alert and continue to be
aware of our surroundings, so we—$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Scouts report an Emblian force has
been sent out from the fortress, and
they're headed this direction!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|We have to retreat before
it's too late.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I-it's already too late! I can see the
dust cloud kicked up by their horses.
We won't make it!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Gah... They're even faster than
I'd anticipated... It seems like
we're short on options.$k$p$Sbs3000|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Wait. That's...$k$pLetizia? Is that you? ...Sissy!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Veronica? And...company?$k$pI never expected we'd have our
next reunion here of all places.$k$pHow many years has it been now?
You've certainly grown since last
I saw you!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Smile|It has been a long time. I am happy
to see you looking well, Sissy.$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|And I you! Still think of me as your
Sissy, do you? Some things never
do change, I suppose.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|...Princess Veronica? Who is—$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|Ah! I am Letizia. Ninth in Embla's
line of succession.$k$pI lead Embla's Order of Heroes.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|So, this is the Directive's leader...$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|You must be Prince Alfonse—which
would make you Princess Sharena,
unless I'm mistaken...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Ah! Right. Although Askr is our
sworn enemy, at the momen—$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|You needn't worry, Veronica.
As always, I am at your service
without question.$k$p$EFace|I have no intention of fighting any
allies of yours, temporary as they
may be. They are free to go.$k$pI presume you had not intended
to encroach on Embla's borders...
Is that correct?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Yes! We had no intention of
trespassing. Thank you so much
for understanding, Letizia!$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|Indeed. There is one other matter
I will warn you about as well.$k$pAt this moment, there is a routine
border patrol passing between here
and Askr.$k$pI believe they plan to perform
combat drills in the area...$k$pI recommend you head toward the
mountain pass to the south. That
route will allow you safe passage.$k$pHere. This map will help you find
your way. With that, I'll be off.$k$pVeronica, we'll speak again soon.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Yes, soon.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|So that's Director Letizia... Is that
the right title? Either way, we're
lucky she's a reasonable person.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Sissy's always been kind.$k$pWhen I was younger, whenever I felt
alone, she was always there to play
with me...and comfort me.$k$pBut we haven't been able to see
one another for some time now.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|What kept you apart?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|...$k$pHer family was...falsely accused
of plotting against the empire.$k$pThey were stripped of their lands,
and I...saw less of them as a result.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|The structure of Embla's line of
succession is a complicated affair...$k$pEndless power struggles between
kinsman, as I understand it.$k$pI recall rumors of treason in Embla
some years ago... Another branch
used them to seize the throne.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...You are referring to my late father.
He is who took the throne.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What?! If that's the case, then...$k$pI would think that might have
something to do with why you
haven't seen her.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Normally I would agree...$k$pBut she writes me often.$k$pShe has always said that whatever
the situation between our parents,
it will not come between us.$k$pShe often says she still thinks of me
as a little sister.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|She sounds so nice!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Yes... She is my Sissy...$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$Fi1500|...How nostalgic. How long has it
been since you last called me Sissy,
I wonder.$k$pIt's always so good to see you,
my dear little Veronica.$k$p$Sbs150|
